PageTitle: irb-reoriginated without-split-group disable(Global EVPN configuration view)
FuncDef:
The irb-reoriginated without-split-group disable command disables the function to advertise re-originated IRB routes without being restricted by a split horizon group (SHG).
The undo irb-reoriginated without-split-group disable command restores the default configuration. The irb-reoriginated without-split-group disable command disables the function to advertise re-originated IRB routes without being restricted by a split horizon group (SHG). The undo irb-reoriginated without-split-group disable command restores the default configuration. By default, re-originated IRB routes are advertised without being restricted by an SHG. This command is supported only on the CE6863H, CE6863H-K, CE6860-SAN, CE6866K, CE6866, CE6860-HAM, CE6855-48XS8CQ, CE6885-SAN, CE8850-SAN, CE8855, CE8851-32CQ4BQ, CE8851K, CE8851-32CQ8DQ-P, CE8850-HAM, CE6881H, CE6881H-K, CE6820H, CE6820H-K, CE6820S, CE6885, CE6885-T, CE6885-LL (standard forwarding mode) and CE6863E-48S8CQ.
